description: The Kids’ Teca Cálido Jacket combines toasty insulation, lightweight materials, and a repurposed polyester taffeta shell for adventure-ready warmth. This versatile layer features a reflective logo for safety and an interior label where your “Little Llama” can write their name. Kids will also love being able to switch up their look to suit the adventure of the day thanks to a fully reversible design. This style is unisex. Also available in men’s and women’s.
name: Teca Calido Jacket - Kids

specs.value: 100% Repurposed Polyester Taffeta with DWR Finish and 600 mm PU Backer
Colorblocked on One side, Quilted on the Other
Reflective logos at chest and back, 2 Hand Pockets
1 Zippered Chest Pocket, Jacket Packs into Chest Pocket
